mapper.select: SELECT id_mechanic as idMechanic, location as location, shop_name as shopName, stars as stars, shop_phone_number as shopPhoneNumber FROM mechanic WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY IF(due_date_payment>=curdate(),due_date_payment,RAND()) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE mechanic SET verification_path=#{verificationPath} WHERE id_mechanic=#{idMechanic} and status = 2
mapper.select: SELECT stars_count as starsCount, stars as stars FROM mechanic WHERE id_mechanic = #{idMechanic} and status = 1
SELECT id_star as idStar, id_seller as idSeller, id_mechanic as idMechanic FROM star WHERE id_seller=#{idSeller} AND status=1
mapper.update: UPDATE mechanic SET stars = (#{stars}+stars*stars_count)/(stars_count+1), stars_count = stars_count+1 WHERE id_mechanic = #{idMechanic} and status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.id_seller as idSeller, a.id_city as idCity, a.location as location, a.shop_name as shopName, a.shop_phone_number as shopPhoneNumber, a.stars as stars, a.stars_count as starsCount, a.verification_path as verificationPath, a.due_date_payment as dueDatePayment, a.status as status FROM mechanic a WHERE a.id_seller = #{idSeller} and a.status !=0
mapper.update: UPDATE mechanic SET due_date_payment = #{dueDatePayment}, tx_id_user = #{transaction.txIdUser}, tx_host = #{transaction.txHost}, tx_update = #{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE id_mechanic = #{idMechanic} and status = 1
